It's a Girl Thing

sassy salsa styling for girlz!!!

The next ladies styling workshop will be on Sat 22nd October

Calling all chicas who like their Cuban salsa with extra sabor: It’s a Girl Thing! this Saturday at The Place Dance Studios. Ladies, it’s time to get your whole body moving, connecting footwork to hip, torso, arm & shoulder movement, so you look and feel great over the party season.

You’ll learn how to develop an effortless, coordinated style during turn patterns and when improvising. Along with meneo, templeque & expressive afro-cuban body movement, there are salsa suelta steps & other rhythms thrown into the mix, so you can really respond to the music, to your dance partner and have more fun.

Whatever your level of salsa experience, this workshops will help you to gain confidence & enjoy your dancing more.

what you’ll learn

Ladies Styling & Afro-Cuban flavours

Despelote!
Cuban body movement & isolation techniques
Salsa Suelta!
footwork that really shines!
Havana Mix-Up!
blending salsa with rumba, son, mambo, cha cha cha, reggaeton & Afro-Cuban steps
prices
£7 for one class, £10 for two–including club entrance

no need to book, just turn up on the day
